localised_text.tooltip_text: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.

Building health||This building is damaged. It can either be fully repaired for a cost, or slowly repair itself over time.

Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IsEmpty && IsPlayerFaction, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_categories_popup"), GetIfElse(CanShowUpgradeOptions, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_construction_popup"), self.SetProperty("mouseover", "")))
